title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the localization key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When attempting to add a localization key, if it is left blank, the externalized text does not appear in the chart.
EB: When attempting to add a localization key, if it is left blank, an error message should be displayed or the field should be marked as required.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the chart settings.
2. Add a localization key without entering any value into the field.
